description: This file defines the FilterProvider class in Dart, which manages filter criteria for a Flutter UI. It provides methods to update various filter parameters such as hair color, race, religion, height range, and weight range, along with reset and apply functions. The class extends ChangeNotifier to notify listeners of state changes.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-derived class that manages filter criteria state for a Flutter app, allowing updates and resets of various filtering parameters.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Sets the entire filter criteria object and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateHairColor
methods.description: Updates the set of selected hair colors, adding or removing a specific color, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateRace
methods.description: Adds or removes a race/ethnicity from the filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateReligion
methods.description: Adds or removes a religion from the filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateHeightRange
methods.description: Updates the height range filter and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateWeightRange
methods.description: Updates the weight range filter and notifies listeners.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the filter criteria to default values and notifies listeners.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Triggers a notification, intended as a placeholder for future logic to refresh matching results.
